name: MySpace Sanitizer
description:
http://quasistoic.org/ts/archives/2006/03/03/sanitizing-myspace/

The incredibly long rule that Kupfel points out is used to get rid of the ads that certain "MySpace Profile Generators" insert into the "About Me" sections of user profiles. See above URL for more info.
